A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney sacrificed the cohesion of the Star Wars universe to meet a corporate strategic objective: brand durability. Plot arcs that are immaterial to story resolution; a non-nonsensical\, emasculated Luke Skywalker; a forced\, social justice agenda; unsatisfying resolutions to story arc mysteries; the needless early killing of an interesting super villain; new\, unanchored force powers\, such as the deadly force-skyping; and the mistreatment of Carrie Fisher's last appearance in a movie are but some of the flaws in this movie. The Last Jedi is visually stunning hot garbage. It's the worst Star Wars movie by a wide margin.
